response.overview: Léon, the top hit man in New York, has earned a rep as an effective "cleaner". But when his next-door neighbors are wiped out by a loose-cannon DEA agent, he becomes the unwilling custodian of 12-year-old Mathilda. Before long, Mathilda's thoughts turn to revenge, and she considers following in Léon's footsteps.
response.tagline: If you want the job done right, hire a professional.
response.title: Léon: The Professional

titles.title: レオン オリジナル版
Léon：The Professional
titles.type: Asian Special Character Set And Spacing
